solution_line_template: Pria's car achieved a rate of {total_miles_driven} miles / {gallons_used} gallons = <<{total_miles_driven}/{gallons_used}={actual_mileage}>>{actual_mileage} miles per gallon.
Therefore, it was a difference of {advertised_mileage} - {actual_mileage} = <<{advertised_mileage}-{actual_mileage}={mileage_difference}>>{mileage_difference} miles per gallon.
